archimate:DataObject.name: Zero Knowledge Proof
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A Proof that uses special cryptography and a Link Secret to support Selective Disclosure of information about a set of Claims from a set of Credentials. A Zero Knowledge Proof provides cryptographic proof about some or all of the data in a set of Credentials without revealing the actual data or any additional information, including the Identity of the Prover.
